title: Africa/Diaspora Dev Tools & Events
description: WADA is rapidly expanding beyond West Africa, in order to sustain and support our growth we need to maintain hosting regular events.
solution: Educating developers in DLT through intensive Haskell & Plutus training, high-impact virtual workshops, events and hackathons (multilingual)
experience: WADA Team: multilingual developers/trainers, event coordinators, marketing, and business experts.
